#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

typedef long long int Lint;

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	Lint i, t, n, a, d, len, sum, fSum, l;
	
	scanf("%llu", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%llu", &n );
		
		fSum = 0;
		
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			
			scanf("%llu %llu", &d, &l );
			a = ( ( l % d ) == 0 ) ? d : ( l % d ); 
			len = ( ( l - a ) / d ) + 1;
			sum = len * ( a + l ) / 2;
			fSum += sum; 
		}
		
		if( ( fSum % 2 ) == 0 )
			printf("NO\n");
		else
			printf("YES\n");
	}
	
	return 0;
}
